summary:
This .txt file levels up all your skills to level 100.
Thus making your character level 81 and giving you 80 perk points.
This is best used alongside cfreeman03\'s http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=665#
descriptionHtml:
This .txt file levels up all your skills to level 100.
Thus making your character level 81 and giving you 80 perk points.
This is best used alongside cfreeman03\'s http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=665#

=========================================================================================

I recommend making a backup save game, then using this .txt.
Then spend all your perk points and using cfreeman03\'s .txt to unlock the remainder of the perks.

=======================
Install Instructions:
=======================

Put levels.txt into your Skyrim folder.

Default: C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

While you are ingame, open the console and type \"bat levels\" (without the \"\")

This .txt is best used alongside http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=665#content (by cfreeman03)
author: Robert Edward Blaine
